name: Caramel Sauce
preparation:
1. In a Multipurpose Pot, whisk sauce mix with whipping cream and butter. Bring to a boil, stirring often.
  2. Reduce heat to medium; simmer for 3–4 min, stirring often. Chill before serving; sauce will thicken as it cools.
tips:
Turn caramel sauce into frosting. Simply refrigerate sauce until cold and firm. Using a hand mixer, beat to desired thickness.

Go Vegan: replace whipping cream with coconut milk.
